medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of right upper quadrant abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after returning home post-discharge, characterized by acute onset of RUQ abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting 4 times, alongside several episodes of watery diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Obstructive sleep apnea on CPAP at setting of 14 2. GERD 3. Asthma 4. C6-C7 with disk herniation leading to radiculopathy with arm pain/numbness 5. Arrhythmias treated for PVCs and PACs 6. Prostatitis 7. Migraine headaches with aura treated with Imitrex 8. Fatty liver 9. RLL nodule 10. History of G-J stenosis with dilation postoperatively.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents living: father with diabetes, hyperlipidemia, and history of hemochromatosis; paternal grandfather with history of hemochromatosis; mother with diabetes, hyperlipidemia, arthritis, and thyroid disease.
